sn51.10:14.1: Note the mixing up of the gender sequence, not found in AN 8.70 or DN 16.
sn51.10:18.1: For this difficult verse, I generally follow Bhikkhu Bodhi’s long discussion in *Connected Discourses of the Buddha*, note 255 on the Mahāvagga. _Sambhava_ means “production, creation”, and here I think it refers to the prolonging of life which the Buddha had just rejected.
